item.title: The New York Times Wants Mothers To Bow To The Fear Of Regret. Christ Has Something Better
item.description: There is no freedom in constantly questioning your existence, wondering if your achievements are good enough by some vague feminist standard.

item.title: Why Pope Leo XIV Will Probably Not Be Francis 2.0
item.description: For Catholics, the new pope’s disposition toward the Latin Mass will tell us far more about his pontificate than his views on immigration.
